body:
Comment 1: 
1. Why are you changing the letter cases of the URL? The cloning URL copy pasted rigth
from the project's page is https://github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql.git, so the import
path is clearly "github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql".

2. Cloning the repo doesn't require a username nor password. Perhaps Github, because
case sensitiviy is not a bug, assumes Go-SQL-Driver is a private account.

3. The linked issue is _not_ a github.com issue tracker.

Why a problem, introduced solely by user's error, should be treated by adding a
"feature" which just undoes that very error?

#WorkingAsIntended
